title: #196 - George Perez & ME
description: Comedian George Perez hangs out in the Mancave w/ me - we drink some beers and talk about his lateral move from chollo to stand-up comic, his quick rise to TV, a fist fight that resulted in him losing it all and going to prison, getting out, and getting back into stand-up...you are going to love this podcast!!!
